command:example.maml:title: --------- Example 2 ---------
command:example.dev:code: $PrimarySmoServer = Connect-SmoServer -ServerInstance MyServer $SecondarySmoServer = Connect-SmoServer -ServerInstance MySecondaryServer Add-LogShippedDatabase -PrimarySmoServerObject $PrimarySmoServer -SecondarySmoServerObject $SecondarySmoServer -DatabaseName AdventureWorks -StagingPath \\MyFileServer\Staging

maml:alert.maml:para:
Does not support multiple backups in Full and Differential backup files. Also, does not support different backup types within a single backup file.
Does not support backups with Full Text Catalog files from SQL Server 2005 backups.
Future development needed to make function time zone aware.
https://sqlbak.com/academy/log-sequence-number

maml:alert.maml:para:
1 VLF When growth rate is less than 1/8 total log size 4 VLF When growth rate is greater than 1/8 total log size and growth less than 64MB 8 VLF When growth rate is greater than 1/8 total log size and growth less than 1GB 16 VLF When growth rate is greater than 1/8 total log size and growth greater than 1GB
Growth rate should not be greater than 64GB

maml:alert.maml:para:
Reorganize will not occur when: - Primary key column contains unique identifier column and does not contain a LOB datatype. - Page lock is off.
Clustered Indexes - For GUIDs, fill factor should be: - 90% for table larger than 10GB - Use 70 or 80 for smaller tables - For integer based key - Use 100% fill factor
To return page density to fill factor, a rebuild must be performed. Reorg must be performed to compress LOBs ??? Verify

maml:alert.maml:para:
Need partition implementation.
Statistics recompilation threshold where n is the number of rows: - \< 500 rows - 500 - \> 500 rows - MIN( 500 + (0.20 * n), SQRT(1,000 * n))
Sample Rate - \< 1024 pages lesser of total pages and (15*power(Rows,0.55)/TotalRows*TotalPages)+1024 - \> 1024 pages (15*power(Rows,0.55)/TotalRows*TotalPages)+1024

dev:remarks.maml:para: Performs table statistics maintenance against all database on local server based on dynamic threshold.
Performs table statistics maintenance against all database using specified Smo session.
Performs table statistics maintenance against database AdventureWorks on local server based on dynamic threshold.
Use static threshold where statics with a row count more than 1024 rows and 100 rows modified.
Performs table statistics maintenance against database AdventureWorks on local server based on dynamic threshold with 50 percent sampling.
Performs table statistics maintenance against database AdventureWorks on local server based on static threshold with row sampling of 1000 rows.
Performs table statistics maintenance against database AdventureWorks on local server to perform full scan and to persist.

dev:remarks.maml:para: Moves all tables and indexes to the NewFilegroup filegroup.
Moves all tables and indexes within the dbo schema to the NewFilegroup filegroup.

command:example.maml:title: --------- Example 3 ---------
command:example.dev:code: Move-SqlDatabaseTable -ServerInstance MySQLInstance -DatabaseName AdventureWorks -FileGroupName NewFilegroup -SchemaName dbo -TableName Users

dev:remarks.maml:para: Moves the table dbo.Users and all indexes on this table to the NewFilegroup filegroup.

command:example.maml:title: --------- Example 4 ---------
command:example.dev:code: Move-SqlDatabaseTable -ServerInstance MySQLInstance -DatabaseName AdventureWorks -FileGroupName NewFilegroup -SchemaName dbo -TableName Users -IndexName IX_Username

dev:remarks.maml:para: Moves the index IX_Username index on the dbo.Users table to the NewFilegroup filegroup.
Moves all tables and indexes to the NewFilegroup filegroup using SmoServer object.

command:example.maml:title: --------- Example 6 ---------
command:example.dev:code: $SmoServer = Connect-SmoServer -ServerInstance MyServer Move-SqlDatabaseTable -SmoServerObject $SmoServer -DatabaseName AdventureWorks -FileGroupName NewFilegroup -SchemaName dbo

dev:remarks.maml:para: Moves all tables and indexes within the dbo schema to the NewFilegroup filegroup using SmoServer object.

command:example.maml:title: --------- Example 7 ---------
command:example.dev:code: $SmoServer = Connect-SmoServer -ServerInstance MyServer Move-SqlDatabaseTable -SmoServerObject $SmoServer -DatabaseName AdventureWorks -FileGroupName NewFilegroup -SchemaName dbo -TableName Users

dev:remarks.maml:para: Moves the table dbo.Users and all indexes on this table to the NewFilegroup filegroup using SmoServer object.

command:example.maml:title: --------- Example 8 ---------
command:example.dev:code: $SmoServer = Connect-SmoServer -ServerInstance MyServer Move-SqlDatabaseTable -SmoServerObject $SmoServer -DatabaseName AdventureWorks -FileGroupName NewFilegroup -SchemaName dbo -TableName Users -IndexName IX_Username

dev:remarks.maml:para: Moves the index IX_Username index on the dbo.Users table to the NewFilegroup filegroup using SmoServer object.

maml:alert.maml:para:
The following parameters have not been implemented:
* @query
* @execute_query_database
* @attach_query_result_as_file
* @query_attachment_filename
* @query_result_header
* @query_result_width
* @query_result_separator
* @exclude_query_output

* @query_result_no_padding

command:example.maml:title: --------- Example 1 ---------
command:example.dev:code: Send-DatabaseMail -ServerInstance MyServer -MailTo 'john@contoso.com' -Subject 'Test message' -Body 'This is a test message.'

dev:remarks.maml:para: Sends email to john@contoso.com from MyServer.

command:example.maml:title: --------- Example 2 ---------
command:example.dev:code: $SqlConnection = Connect-SqlServerInstance -ServerInstance . -DatabaseName master Send-DatabaseMail -SqlConnection $SqlConnection -MailTo 'john@contoso.com' -Subject 'Test message' -Body 'This is a test message.'

dev:remarks.maml:para: Sends email to john@contoso.com from MyServer using the specified SQL Server connection.
